price: 19. Kuwa rumeeyey Allaah iyo Rusushiisa, Kuwaasu weeye run badnayaasha8,  shuhadaduna Rabbigood xaggiis waxay ka heli abaalgudkooda iyo nuurkooda. Kuwase Xaqa diida oo beeniya Aayadahayaga, kuwaasi waa ehlu Naarka.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصِّدِّيقُونَۖ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرُهُمۡ وَنُورُهُمۡۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
footnotes: 8. Tafsiir kale oo sax ah waxaa weeye: Oo kuwaa rumeysan Allaah iyo Rusushiisa kuwaas weeye run badnayaasha iyo markhaatiyada Rabbigood agtiis.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū bil-lahi warusulihi ulāika humu al-ṣidīqūna wal-shuhadāu ʿinda rabbihim lahum ajruhum wanūruhum wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
